name: rise
tileDescription: Rise makes craft single-serve coffee that is good for the planet. Through our partnership with Pure Earth, each order helps to continue their work cleaning up toxic pollution around the world.

name: balance
tileDescription: Balance helps you take charge of your health while caring for those in need. Both of our wellness brands collaborate with Love146, a charity that is fighting against child trafficking.

name: nourish
tileDescription: Nourish brand kitchen tools were created in partnership with the Global Orphan Project, so every purchase helps support their work providing meals and other care to vulnerable children.

name: weight gurus
tileDescription: Weight Gurus smartphone-connected scales allow you to track your health goals while also giving back. Both of our wellness brands help support Love146â€™s fight to end child trafficking.

name: connect
tileDescription: Your devices help you balance responsibilities and maintain strong relationships. Through Connect, we wanted to create high-quality electronics and tech accessories that help you create communities, while helping children in need find their own.
